SEARCH
Package Controllers

Class AdministratorController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.AdministratorController
public class AdministratorController extends Object
Controller class for Administrator functionality in the Hospital Management System. Handles staff management, appointment viewing, and inventory management.

    • addDoctor

      public boolean addDoctor(String id, String name, char gender, int age)
      Adds a new doctor to the system
      Parameters:
      id - Unique identifier for the doctor
      name - Doctor's full name
      gender - Doctor's gender (M/F/O)
      age - Doctor's age
      Returns:
      true if addition successful, false otherwise

    • addPharmacist

      name - Pharmacist's full name
      gender - Pharmacist's gender (M/F/O)
      age - Pharmacist's age
      Returns:
      true if addition successful, false otherwise

    • updateDoctor

      public boolean updateDoctor(String id, String name, char gender, int age)
      Updates doctor information
      Parameters:
      id - Doctor's ID to update
      name - New name (null if unchanged)
      gender - New gender (0 if unchanged)
      age - New age (-1 if unchanged)
      Returns:
      true if update successful, false otherwise
